Posts.Content: Jun 20, 2008 12:00AM canadianchick wrote: I have a PICC line/ I guess it is a type of Hickman line in my left upper arm feeding into the heart and hate it !!  I have had a really hard time finding summer shirts with sleeves long enough to cover it.  I have had it in since the middle of March and it had begun to get infected.  I have to go to the hopsital twice a week to get it cleaned as they won't let me do it at home anymore.    You can't not have a bath or do any repetative movement with it.  (only good thing about the repetivive movement is I haven't touch a vacuum cleaner in months)  I need to plastic sleeve it for showering.  I use to love my hot showers, now with no hair and a plastic bag they are no longer enjoyable only a necessity.  The reason for my PICC choice was the wait time to get the port put in.  I had one round completed before I could have the port put in and I was anxious to get started so it could be over sooner.   Also up here you have to wait for open OR time to get the port taken out so even when you think you don't have to see the wonderful nurses anymore you still have to go in for maintainance.    Everytime I see the nurses I make them promise that on the day of my last treatment ( Mid Aug ) I go home PICC free.
